pullrequest.title: Move the camera to canonical angles

content.raw:
Morgan recommended adding a Solidworks feature that lets you select Isometric, Dimetric, and Trimetric viewing angles, with emphasis on the first two. These options could fit into the drop down (but not within another drop down, as SW does it). How much work do you think this would be, @chapulina?
![sw-isometric.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2720904443-sw-isometric.png)
content.html: Morgan recommended adding a Solidworks feature that lets you select Isometric, Dimetric, and Trimetric viewing angles, with emphasis on the first two. These options could fit into the drop down (but not within another drop down, as SW does it). How much work do you think this would be, @chapulina?
